name: Space Squid
description:
Space Squid, the larger than life Space Shooter that pits you against a technologically advanced planet that will kill you unless you outsmart it with your tethergun!
Use the power of the stars and move from planet to planet to destroy the enemy! Each star have different abilities and the player needs to use them to their advantage.

Hope you enjoy it as much as we do!

//Team Potaton
